summary: The Davies expect a baby, which turns out to be a monster with a nasty habit of killing when it's scared. And it's easily scared.
cast: John P. Ryan|Sharon Farrell|Andrew Duggan|Guy Stockwell|James Dixon|Michael Ansara|Robert Emhardt|William Wellman Jr.|Shamus Locke|Nancy Burnett|Patrick McAllister|Daniel Holzman|Diana Hale|Gerald York|Jerry Taft|Gwil Richards|W. Allen York
title: Estoy vivo
